motifications.messages.title: Messages
motifications.messages.default:
You'll fix that bug in no time
You're doing great!
If you haven't already, you should take a break
motifications.messages.markdownDescription: Specify the messages that will be displayed in the notifications. Separate each message with a new line.

enumDescriptions: Notifications will display every x second(s)
Notifications will display every x minute(s)
Notifications will display every x hour(s)
Notifications will display every x day(s)

motifications.interval.value.markdownDescription: The interval number for the unit specified.

motifications.messages.custom.markdownDescription: Use custom times when messages will appear during the day instead of set intervals.

motifications.messages.custom.times.markdownDescription: The list of times that messages should appear at. Separate each time with a new line.
